        public List<StripeStatistics> getStripeStatistics()
                                           throws IOException
        Deprecated. the user should use Reader.getStripeStatistics instead.
        Get the stripe statistics from the file tail. This code is for compatibility with ORC 1.5.
        Returns:
        the stripe statistics
        Throws:
